casebody.data:
OHIO HIGH SCHOOL ATHLETIC ASSN.
v.
RUEHLMAN 2018-1200 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 24, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Prohibition. Sua sponte, respondent shall file a response, if any, to relator's motion for emergency stay and expedited alternative writ no later than 9:00 a.m. on Monday, August 27, 2018.
